The
superconducting
critical
temperature
Tc
increased with
increase
in x in (La1 -xSrx)2
associated
with
the
short-
ening
of
the
Cu-O
bond
in
the
basal
plane
and
the
elongation of
the
lattice
along
the
c-axis
in
the
K2NiF4
structure. The
results
are
discussed
in
terms
of
two-dimensional
itinerant band
formation
of
Cu: dx2-y2
( Received
January
13, 1987 )
